summary: Website/app with booking and shop features; extend existing Admin tab to manage booking availability, session extensions, and business/contact settings.
architectural_notes: Use the existing Admin tab (authenticated admin area) as the management UI for booking slots and business/contact settings.
Booking availability is managed by manually toggling individual time slots; only 'live' slots are bookable by customers.
15-minute add-on extensions are staff-only actions performed during an active session and should be allowed only when the subsequent slot is unbooked.
Time slot creation should auto-generate 30-minute slots and persist them so they appear in both Admin and public Booking views.
known_issues: BUG: 'Create time slot' shows success message but no time slots appear in Admin Manage Time Slots or on the main Booking page (slots seemingly not persisted and/or not retrieved for display).

existing_features.title: Replace the placeholder booking availability logic with a persisted, admin-managed time-slot availability system that supports manually toggling individual 30-minute slots as available/unavailable and publishing those slots as "live" so customers can book them.

Implement staff-only 15-minute extensions for an ongoing 30-minute session, allowed only if the immediately following 15-minute segment is not booked (i.e., extending does not overlap another booking).

Add editable business/contact information fields (simple text only) that can be updated from the existing Admin area, and make the updated information available on public pages that display venue/business details.
Update the booking UI copy and duration presentation to match the new 30-minute slot model and ensure booking confirmation and slot cards reflect the correct duration.
Fix the time slot listing logic so that newly created time slots appear in the Admin "Manage Time Slots" list immediately after creation (even when they are not yet published/live).

Add an admin-only backend query to retrieve all time slots (including hidden/unpublished and disabled slots) and update the Admin Slots UI to use this query instead of the public "available time slots" query.

Ensure the Booking page continues to show only bookable slots (live + enabled + in the future) and that admin slot creation only causes bookable slots to appear on Booking once an admin publishes them (sets Live).
Update the Admin success messaging after slot creation to avoid implying slots are immediately visible to customers when they are created as hidden/unpublished by default.

new_feature_requests.summary: Extend existing Admin tab to manually toggle individual booking time slots (availability) and publish slots live for customers to book
Staff-only ability to add a 15-minute extension to an ongoing 30-minute session (only if the next slot is unbooked)
Admin tab: editable business/contact info via simple text fields (e.g., phone, email, address, description) and other business settings as requested

projectName: Extend Admin panel to manage booking availability, staff 15-minute extensions, and editable contact info
